Package controllers

Class AlbumPreviewController

java.lang.Object
controllers.AlbumPreviewController
public class AlbumPreviewController
extends java.lang.Object
Handles each album's display on the user home page
Author:
Swapnil Napuri, Srinandini Marpaka

    • start

      public void start​(User currentUser, Album currentAlbum, UserHomeController userHomeController)
      Sets up the container displaying a album on the 'Home' screen
      Parameters:
      currentUser - user logged in
      currentAlbum - album to be displayed
      userHomeController - controller that displays all the user's albums

    • imageViewMouseClicked

      public void imageViewMouseClicked​(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent e) throws java.io.IOException
      Takes the user to the album view
      Parameters:
      e - represents that the album's cover has been clicked
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - if album screen file is not found
